titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of McCarthy v. Byrd, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 9/28/2010--Passed Senate without amendment. Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senator Inouye, the President Pro Tempore of the Senate, in the case of McCarthy v. Byrd, et al.
